meanings.sent1: The old man is dieing peacefully in his sleep.
meanings.sent2: The flowers are dieing because they haven't been watered.
meanings.sent3: The idea of my phone dieing during the movie made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her hopes of winning the race were slowly dieing away.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the engine dieing echoed through the garage.

meanings.sent1: She is dieing her hair a vibrant shade of red.
meanings.sent2: The fabric is dieing unevenly due to the dye not spreading properly.
meanings.sent3: The thought of accidentally dieing her skin green was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The colors of the sunset were dieing the sky with beauty.
meanings.sent5: The artist was dieing the canvas with bold strokes of paint.
